name: Micro Adventure
description:
Micro Adventure is a small, yet unforgiving platformer made for Mini Jam 20.
It has minimalistic graphics and tasks the player with getting to the end of 2 short levels.  Make sure to collect all the Music Notes on your way through the levels.

Consider leaving a comment or following my itch page if you enjoyed it. 

Controls:
WASD/ Arrows - Move as standard

Space - Jump
